entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: N 69 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then periods of snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
